simplified_text:
Where do these weird and extreme traits come from? They might be there from the start (nature) or picked up from the people and places around us (nurture). But maybe the founders arenâ€™t as extreme as they look. Could they be making certain traits seem bigger than they really are? Or is it that everyone else is making them seem more extreme? All of these things can happen together, and when they do, they really boost each other. It usually begins with unique people and ends with them acting and looking even more unique.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** This passage talks about where extreme traits come from, suggesting they can be natural or learned. It also explores how perceptions can exaggerate these traits, creating a cycle of uniqueness.
